alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:28PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Gusty winds and blowing dust will impact portions of south central Grant and west central Luna Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated showers and thunderstorms along with an outflow boundary. This activity extends from 10 miles west of Deming to 7 miles west of Gage to 5 miles northwest of Separ. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph with blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will lower visibility and make for hazardous travel, particularly on Interstate 10.. Locations impacted include... Gage and Separ. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 38 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
